title: BHP Group Plc (BBL) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 05, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: BHP Group Plc ( BBL  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 05, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $1.56 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 25, 2019. Shareholders who purchased BBL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This represents an 41.82% increase over prior dividend payment.
The previous trading day's last sale of BBL was $42.73, representing a -17.62% decrease from the 52 week high of $51.87 and a 12.33% increase over the 52 week low of $38.04.

BBL is a part of the Energy sector, which includes companies such as Alliance Resource Partners, L.P. ( ARLP  ) and Peabody Energy Corporation ( BTU  ). Zacks Investment Research reports BBL's forecasted earnings growth in 2020 as 12.84%, compared to an industry average of 7.3%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the BBL Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
Interested in gaining exposure to BBL through an Exchange Traded Fund [ETF]?   The following ETF(s) have BBL as a top-10 holding:  First Trust Indxx Global Natural Resources Income ETF (   FTRI    ).
The top-performing ETF of this group is FTRI with an decrease of -13.07% over the last 100 days. It also has the highest percent weighting of BBL at 4.26%.
